result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Hit and Run-Involve Great Bodily Harm

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Walter Garrett Grebe

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Walter Garrett Grebe in court.  Attorney Gregory Francis Rothstein in court for Walter Garrett Grebe.  Attorney Kimberly Dorice Schoepp in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for plea hearing. Defense requested plea hearing adjournment; case was scheduled for a status conference and possible plea hearing on August 4, 2022. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 36. Plea hearing scheduled for December 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Walter Garrett Grebe in court with attorney Gregory Francis Rothstein.  Alexandria S. Carlson appeared for the State of Wisconsin on behalf of Kimberly Schoepp.
Case in court for a scheduling conference.  Defense acknowledges receipt of an offer.  Defendant has pending case in Waukesha County.  Defense requests a status/projected guilty plea date.  Court scheduled the matter as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 36, Rm 316 SB.  Plea hearing scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Supervision Report 8.4.22

Defendant Walter Garrett Grebe in court, appear by video with attorney Gregory Francis Rothstein, appear by video.  Gregg Herman appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
 Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 38, Judge Wagner. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 38.  All parties are notified that effective July 30, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Laura A. Crivello, Branch 36,  in Room 313 of the Safety Building.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Adjustment Number: 22A 055298,
Payable Number: 1013021,
Receipt Number: 22RP023836,
Amount: $20.00

$3000.00 cash bail was posted. Commissioner increased his bail by $4500.00. The total is $7500.00.
The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription and no dangerous weapons or firearms.
Court orders defendant TO JUSTICE POINT for Level 4 supervision. Defendant to report to JUSTICE POINT immediately upon leaving court.  
THE DEFENDANT FAILS TO REPORT A WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.
No driving without a valid license.

Defendant Walter Garrett Grebe in court with attorney Gregory Francis Rothstein.  Stephan Eduard Nolten appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Walter Garrett Grebe
Current: 3238 S 60th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53219   (Effective: 06-10-2022)
Prior: W186 S7645 Lincoln Drive, Muskego, WI 53150
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 6/10/22 @ 1p
